summary: The implementation successfully addresses all six requirements from the BuildRequest. The code includes a complete Script Vault Hub application with backend data models, frontend UI components, authentication, search/filtering, script detail views, and a developer-focused dark theme. All acceptance criteria are met with evidence in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with ProfileSetupModal, saveCallerUserProfile, and getCallerUserProfile
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention user profiles or profile setup. Only authentication and script management were requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin access control system with MixinAuthorization and AccessControl modules
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention admin functionality or role-based access control. It only specifies Internet Identity authentication for script submission and management.

hallucinated_features.description: MyScriptsPage with edit and delete functionality for user's own scripts
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest mentions 'Users can manage their own submitted scripts' but provides no specific requirements about editing or deleting scripts. The acceptance criteria only covers submission.
Script deletion was not explicitly requested in the requirements. REQ-5 mentions management but acceptance criteria only specify submission capability.
